data.author: Yaoyu Yang

changelog.release_notes: Update to SDK4.3
Add bus route number in subtitle.
Add overflow of stop name to subtitle.
Add Vancouver support. Move stopIdList to Parse.
Add Pebble Round support. Upgraded to SDK 3.10.
Add Portland support! Rewrite functions for processing transit api data into modules.
Add long click bus detail for favorite bus, remake the detail page UI.
Long click for bus stop detail page and new bus detail page
Rewrite codes into modules, add Settings page, add autoRefresh for busRoutesMenu, fix bugs in Boston, new way of add and remove favorite stops.
New welcome page, fix bugs in version 1.71 and 1.72.
Fix bug that mis displays information due to add new Favorite stops item in the Nearby stops menu. New welcome page.
Fix a bug that Favorite stops disappear when refresh Nearby stops page.

Add a menu item called Favorite stops in Nearby stops. User can click Favorite stops and get a list of saved favorite stops. Then user can directly click the stops to get real time arrival information.
Time prediction instead of distance prediction for New York where data is available. Add version page. Fix bug in Boston when API provides no info.
Add support for Boston. Display one digit precision time for predictions under 5 minutes. Add color for Basalt application.
Now works in New York area. Add more radius options for 760-1060.
Add bus detail page where you click each bus line.
Minor updates to not show buses that have left more than 1 min ago.
Added support for Tampa area, more Settings radius options, and also added settings entry in the bus real time info page.
Check nearby bus stops, real bus timing info from each stop, able to favorite any stop, favorited stop bus real time info will be brought up at the first page if user is near that stop.

data.description:
Check bus or transit time everyday? You'll love this app! CatchOneBus will show nearby transit stops and live arrival times. You can save any stop as favorite and CatchOneBus will show your favorite stop's live arrival time immediately when you are near that stop and open the app. You can shake your Pebble to update the information in real time.

Currently works in the following list of cities and areas and supported by the public transit API provided by various organizations and agencies.
• Seattle, Tacoma, Bellevue, Everett, WA  (OneBusAway)
• Portland, Beaverton, Gresham, Hillsboro, OR (TriMet)
• Boston, Cambridge, Medford, MA (MBTA)
• New York metropolitan area, NY (MTA)
• Tampa Area, FL (HART)
• Vancouver, BC (Translink)

Using Tips:
• Make sure to turn on location services on your Pebble Time app on the phone.
• Save a bus stop as favorite for easy access, especially for your daily used stops for commute.
• Set quick launch on your pebble watch for CatchOneBus to achieve checking commuter bus real time with one click.

App developed by Yaoyu Yang and Dian Zhang. Give us a like or feedback!

latest_release.release_notes: Add bus route number in subtitle.

data.title: CatchOneBus
